element.name: Amazing Grace Geocache by justydawson, Traditional Cache (2/3)
element.description: Located along the Wicklow way at the viewing point of Powerscourt Waterfall and Crone Woods. Near the wall but not IN the wall
element.long-description:
[Please note this cache is hidden near an old wall. Please dont pull bricks from the wall or disturb the wall in any way because it is not hidden within the wall structure]
The Amazing Grace Geocache is named after my mum Grace. We used to go to Powercourt regularly just on days out as Mother and Son.
After her passing and thanks to the forest owners I have got a memorial seat located on the trail overlooking Powercourt Waterfall. Please take your time to sit and admire the view. The cache is a Pelican box located close by.
I ask for one thing as the owner of this cache and the seat, please respect the seat, please report any damage to it or the nearby Geocache and I hope you enjoy this beautiful location.
To get there travel to Enniskerry, then to Powercourt Waterfall, head towards Crone Car Park and start from the car park. The car park is open until 4pm.
element.encoded-hints: This is an easy find. Look for the unusual give aways nearby. Please hide well. [Please note this cache is hidden near an old wall. Please dont pull bricks from the wall or disturb the wall in any way because it is not hidden within the wall structure]

ul.li:
2010-05-18T19:00:00Z : Found it by Toffee Man
Last find of the day with Shailaja on a lovely day's caching in the mountains. Whilst the view was not good from Djouce (due to clouds) - the waterfall & park below this lovely spot was something else. TFTC Toffee Man #349

2010-05-18T19:00:00Z : Found it by Shailaja
Found on a hike with Toffee Man. Last cache of the day on the way back to the car park. Beautiful location for it and well hidden! GC out and Sidetracked GC was not in this cache. TFTC Shailaja
[This entry was edited by Shailaja on Tuesday, May 18, 2010 at 4:16:41 PM.]

2010-05-15T19:00:00Z : Found it by justydawson
Found by Carl, Danny, Sami, Ken and Paul on a day out hiking in the mountains.
Photos to follow. =) :):) [8D]

2010-04-29T15:04:26Z : Found it by edwincartwright
Found this one on our first day on the wicklow way. Nice place for our first stop. Tftc!

wpt.desc: Amazing Grace Geocache by justydawson, Traditional Cache (2/3)
